item.title: What I've learned from the book the 7 habits of highly effective people
item.description: I’ve recently listened to the audiobook the seven habits of highly effective people on storytel and in my opinion, the lessons that the book teaches are invaluable, what I took away from the book the most is that we are responsible for our lives and despite our pre-dispositions we can fight back and try to become better people, and that’s I goal that I’ve set for myself just be a better person every day.
